AAD.caption: CSS Selectors
AAD.doc: CSS selectors to be embedded into a temporary STYLE element. Will be append in the order of the list.
AAD.name: styleselectors

AAE.caption: HTML Pages
AAE.doc: HTML pages to be embedded into a temporary invisible DIV element of the current page. Will be appended in the order of the list.
AAE.name: htmlpages

AAF.caption: Margin (mm)
AAF.doc: Margin of the page in millimetres.
AAF.name: pagemargin

AAG.caption: Copies
AAG.doc: Number of copies of the document to make.
AAG.name: copies

AAH.caption: Width (mm)
AAH.doc: Width of the page in millimetres, in the direction of head travel.
AAH.name: pagewidth

AAI.caption: Height (mm)
AAI.doc: Height of the page in millimetres, in the direction of page feed.
AAI.name: pageheight

AAL.caption: Style and send an HTML snippet straight to the browser print dialog without using IFRAMEs, popups, or new browser tabs.
AAL.name: information
